Text:
"Melatonin Magik" (February 2010)

In December 2009, it was announced that Canibus was in the process of releasing 
his 9th studio album "Melatonin Magik."

---

For Promotional Use Only... Remember to support the artists...
Anyway enjoy the Music,it is free!!!!
THA SHIT   !!!!!!      I will be buying this too!!!

Good to see NoFS still going strong, good work NOS. This album is one to buy for sure, 'bis deserves the support. 

Album artwork is by Invisionism Studios - http://invisionism.com

Proper album art, unbutchered by the record label...

Canabis deserves all the support he can get, BUY this ALBUM. Only use piracy to trial material.
Alright, definitely gettin' on this. It's nice to see DZK finally getting some big-time collab work; Post Traumatic Warlab Stress is one of the dopest tracks I've heard in a while.
